Search Flights

{{flight}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchFlights=['American Airlines', 'British Airways','Luthansa','Qatar Airways',' Air India'] ngOnInit(): void { } }
